Name: Containment Search
About the game: Story Ethan Connor a brave young adult who took his life into his own hands and moved things by moving in a garage complex. The others said he couldn't get his own life under control, so he decided to live for himself. But! one fatefull evening he decided to drive to the warehouse. No way he could have known, which dark and cruel secrets it had hiding inside.... The horror awaits you Dark psycho horror experience 3 generators to refill Note every step Endless horror mode A new horror experience for old and new players The monster is waiting for you A monster from beyond, that seeks fear and terror just to hunt. The first Reports of this specific Enemy randomly appeared in 2005. It seems to have Aggressive properties and is known for hiding in dark lairs. It is described as slim, dark and with a water tank seated on his Head. It is said it escaped from a Laboratory Facility, but thats all we know, the Presidium for Paranormal Activitys, didnt reveal much about him. Features: Find youre long since forgetten Deposit Box Find out the truth Look in the terrors eyes Featuring: A long forgetten place A dark and Hostile Envoirment Collectables 5 Important Items to discover
